lead_paragraph: Jon Bon Jovi is hoping he's written a hit with Buffalo Bills fans in a bid to stem concerns of whether his prospective ownership group plans to buy and potentially relocate the franchise to Toronto.

headline.main: Letter: Bon Jovi Wants Bills to Succeed in Buffalo
headline.print_headline: Letter: Bon Jovi Wants Bills to Succeed in Buffalo

snippet: Jon Bon Jovi is hoping he's written a hit with Buffalo Bills fans in a bid to stem concerns of whether his prospective ownership group plans to buy and potentially relocate the franchise to Toronto....
